label: Record Retention and Inspection
quote: All records pertaining to the transit, storage, and delivery will be maintained and available for inspection for the lessor of the term of the contract, the period of performance, or one calendar year from the date the activity occurred.

label: Record Accessibility for Government Inspection
quote: These records must be readily available for inspection by any agent designated by the US Government as having the authority to examine them.

label: Custody Minimization and Tamper-Proof Packaging
quote: This transit process shall minimize the number of times en route components undergo a change of custody and make use tamper-proof or tamper-evident packaging for all shipments.

label: Shipping Status Availability
quote: The supplier, at the Governmentâ€™s request, shall be able to provide shipping status at any time during transit.

label: Liability for Shipment Damage or Loss
quote: The Contractor is fully liable for all damage, deterioration, or losses incurred during shipment and handling, unless the damage, deterioration, or loss is due to the Government.

label: Packing Slip Requirements
quote: The Contractor shall provide a packing slip which shall accompany each container or package with the information identifying the contract number, the order number, a description of the hardware/software enclosed (Manufacturer name, model number, serial number), and the customer point of contact.

label: Electronic Shipping Notification
quote: The contractor shall send a shipping notification to the intended government recipient or contracting officer. This shipping notification shall be sent electronically and will state the contract number, the order number, a description of the hardware/software being shipped (manufacturer name, model number, serial number), initial shipper, shipping date and identifying (tracking) number.

label: COTS Product PIV Enablement
quote: The COTS product must be enabled to use PIV credential, in accordance with NIST guidelines including Federal Information Processing Standard Publication (FIPS) 201

label: Desktop PIV Card Reader Requirement
quote: The desktops must have a PIV card reader.

label: Custom Software PIV Authentication
quote: The custom software product must be able to use PIV credential for authentication purpose.

label: PIV Enablement for Controlled Facilities and Systems
quote: Procurements for products, systems, services, hardware, or software involving controlled facility or information system shall be PIV-enabled by accepting HSPD-12 PIV credentials as a method of identity verification and authentication.
section: Personal Identification Verification (PIV) Credential Compliance Requirement

label: Software PIV Credential Authentication
quote: Procurements for software products or software developments shall be compliant by PIV by accepting PIV credentials as the common means of authentication for access for federal employees and contractors.
section: Personal Identification Verification (PIV) Credential Compliance Requirement

label: Cryptographic Challenge for PIV Systems
quote: PIV-enabled information systems must demonstrate that they can correctly work with PIV credentials by responding to the cryptographic challenge in the authentication protocol before granting access.
section: Personal Identification Verification (PIV) Credential Compliance Requirement

label: Remediation Plan for PIV Non-Compliance
quote: If a system is identified to be non-compliant with HSPD-12 for PIV credential enablement, a remediation plan for achieving HSPD-12 compliance shall be required for review, evaluation, and approval by the CISO.
section: Personal Identification Verification (PIV) Credential Compliance Requirement

label: Correction of Deficient Deliverables
quote: The COR will have the right to reject or require correction of any deficiencies found in the deliverables The Contractor may have an opportunity to correct the rejected deliverable and return it per delivery instructions.

label: Timely Delivery of Deliverables
quote: Contractor will be responsible for timely delivery to Government personnel in the agreed upon review chain, at each stage of the review.

label: Maintain Review Schedule
quote: The Contractor will work with personnel reviewing the deliverables to assure that the established schedule is maintained.

label: Updated QCP Provision
quote: The COR has the right to audit the Contractor and request an updated copy of the QCP at any time during the life of the contract.

label: Travel Approval Requirement
quote: The Contracting Officer or COR must approve all travel in advance.

label: Travel Documentation Responsibility
quote: The contractor will be responsible for ensuring that contractor personnel have the travel documentation necessary to perform the work.

label: Work Hours and Overtime Approval
quote: The contractor staff will perform work during the normal business hours not to exceed 8 hours per workday unless otherwise noted and approved for overtime by the COR. Alternate Work Schedule (AWS) are available, but must be approved in advance by the COR. Requests for overtime should be sent to the COR prior to hours being worked.

label: Overtime Hours Recording and Tracking
quote: The contractor is responsible for properly recording and tracking overtime hours on each invoice.

label: Telework Authorization
quote: Any telework will be required to be authorized and approved at the discretion of the COR prior to teleworking.

label: OPM Retirement and Benefits Compliance
quote: The Contractor will comply with the OPM information on retirement and benefits guidelines found at the link below:

label: DHS PII Safeguarding Compliance
quote: The Contractor will ensure that all employees assigned to work on the Contract will comply with the DHS Handbook for Safeguarding Sensitive Personally Identifiable Information, found at the link below:
